{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Pyre |image = [[File:Mt. Pyre.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Mt. Pyre |tokens = 28,000 |location = On the East of Route 122. }} '''Mt. Pyre''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 280,000 |- | Boss || 880,000 |- | Duskull || 890,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Shuppet * Duskull * Vulpix * Wingull * Meditite * Shuppet (boss) * Duskull (boss) * Chimecho (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
